title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refund of individual taxes in 2001 and to establish a 10 percent rate bracket beginning in 2001, and for other purposes.
content: Economic Stimulus Tax Cut Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat an eligible taxpayer as having made a payment of the lesser of the prior year's tax liability or a specified applicable amount against individual and employment taxes. Reduces specified individual tax rates.
